messages.subject: Re: Favorite Quotes
messages.msgSnippet: Nancy, Thanks so much.  What a wonderful site.  You must be a quote junky too. Ann
messages.messageBody:
Nancy,
Thanks so much. What a wonderful site. You must be a quote junky too.
Ann

messages.subject: Re: Favorite Quotes
messages.msgSnippet: Ann, I have already compiled several education-related quotes.  You can read them at: http://www.geocities.com/Heartland/Trail/3405/Quotes.html It s part of my
messages.messageBody:
Ann,

I have already compiled several education-related quotes. You can read
them at:
http://www.geocities.com/Heartland/Trail/3405/Quotes.html

It's part of my overall homeschooling site:
http://www.geocities.com/Heartland/Trail/3405

It has a special "Natural Learning" section which needs more input from
all unschoolers:
http://clik.to/Naturallearning

I hope this helps,
Nancy

A. Yates wrote:
>
> I'm compiling our support groups latest roster. I like to put quotes
> in
> there. Subjects can be anything...education, unschooling, or just
> life.
>
> What are your favorites?
> Ann
